title: Motorbike License A1
description: Allows operation of motorbikes up to 175cc.ffff

title: Car License B1
description: Enables driving passenger cars with up to 9 seats.

title: Car License B2
description: Allows operation of manual transmission cars under 3,500 kg.

title: Truck License C
description: Permits driving trucks over 3,500 kg and other heavy vehicles.
